channel.title: Easter Ring (Wont turn me into an egg)
channel.description: Ive tried every tutorial that i could find. None of them turned me into an egg. I tried to get the Greegree to work, and I got it to work, but ::pnpc wouldnt work anymore. Its really pissing me off. So please if you can help me?

item.title: Easter Ring (Wont turn me into an egg)
item.dc:creator: @Doing_Cho21 Doing Cho2
item.description:
@Doing_Cho21 wrote:

        if (playerCommand.startsWith("pnpc"))
            {
            try {
                int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(playerCommand.substring(5));
                if (newNPC <= 200000 && newNPC >= 0) {
                    c.npcId2 = newNPC;
                    c.isNpc = true;
                    c.updateRequired = true;
                    c.setAppearanceUpdateRequired(true);
                } 
                else {
                    c.sendMessage("No such P-NPC.");
                }
            } catch(Exception e) {
                c.sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pnpc #");
            }
        }

Read full topic
item.source: Easter Ring (Wont turn me into an egg)
